== Khadpoli (565247) ==

Khadpoli is a village in the [[Chiplun]] taluka of [[Ratnagiri]] district with an area of 708 hectares and harbouring 624 households with total population of 2577 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chiplun]] is at a distance of 11 km. Male population is 1316 and female population is 1261. Scheduled Caste Population is 209 and Scheduled Tribes population is 32. Census Location Code of the village is 565247<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
